channel.title: poem on Call me nik
channel.description: Recent content in poem on Call me nik

item.title: Until next time
item.description: 15 years spent together Throughout which you never left my side I am finally faced with the challenge of having to say goodbye Nothing could ever prepare me for this Here’s to the times you never gave up on me I couldn’t be happier that you are going far in life But I just wish it wasn’t so soon You picked me up when I fell You always lent a shoulder to cry on

item.title: Last resort
item.description: for when the last tree is felled last animal, slaughtered last drop of water, wasted last grain of food, consumed last wall, crumbled what will humanity turn to? Â ~ Nikhil

item.title: Pride, Our Undoing
item.description: for the world to decay, we would need to take much away. humanity’s pride would do the deed humanity’s extinction would be guaranteed. in a planet of 8 million kinds of living beings it is a folly to believe that we matter the most. ~ Nikhil
